title: Quintos e Oitavos
body: In the articles concerning the Island of Porto Santo, we have already given a brief account of the famous decree of October 13, 1770, known by the name 'Quintos e Oitavos', and we refer the reader to it.

Porto Santo: Island where the famous decree of 'Quintos e Oitavos' was decreed

1770: Year of the decree of 'Quintos e Oitavos'
